HowToUse0: Enable/disable the ability to go into hard mode by submitting a number without playing the sequence. (default: false)
HowToUse1: Forces the module to start out in octOS. (default: false)
HowToUse2: Exclusive to OctOS, shortens the strike animation to be 15 seconds instead of 57.5 seconds. (default: false)
HowToUse3: Have the module shake upon every played beat, don't use this on serious bombs. :) (default: false)
HowToUse4: Force the module to play the alternative solve sequence regardless of Forget The Colors' existence. (default: false)
HowToUse5: Alter the amount of times other colors flash. Cannot exceed 6. (default: 5)
HowToUse6: Alter the delay between each beat played. Cannot exceed 1. (default: 0.07)
HowToUse7: Change the display on the module when it is solved. If left blank, it will pull its default quotes. (default: empty)
HowToUse8: Cruel mode forces the user to recognise the colors of the buttons without being told from the label. (default: false)
HowToUse9: Mainly for TwitchPlays, set this to the amount of seconds of the stream delay. 1 second of stream delay equates to +15 additional seconds on the timer. (default: 0)
HowToUse10: Amount of dimensions, for accessibility/practice. Ranges 3-12. WARNING: Higher dimension may cause lag. (default: 9)
HowToUse11: Amount of rotations, for accessibility/practice. Ranges 0-255. (default: 3)
HowToUse12: Determines the slowness of the sphere's movements, for accessibility/practice. Ranges 1-12. (default: 8)
HowToUse13: Maintains the color that was initially assigned to the sphere while moving around, making reads much easier. (default: false)
HowToUse14: Makes rotations use the InOutBounce ease, not suitable for serious play. (default: false)
HowToUse15: Makes rotations use the InOutElastic ease, not suitable for serious play. (default: false)
HowToUse16: Stretches the individual X, Y, and Z axes on the tesseract to always take up the entire module. This does cause proportions to be skewed. (default: false)
HowToUse17: Enables 32-bit vertex indexing. Enabling this may improve rendering on high-end devices. Requires a restart to take effect. (default: false)
